name: You're the One Who Should Disappear.
effect: [Counter] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] If you have 0 Life cards, you may add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards. Then, trash 1 card from your hand.
